snippet: Vying for $15,000 in cash prizes, developers have created intriguing transit-themed apps for smartphones and even regular old computers.
abstract: App City column on MTA App Quest, competition sponsored by Metropolitan Transportation Authority in which authority provides raw data to developers to create useful transit-themed apps; contest offers $15,000 in cash prizes.
lead_paragraph: Vying for $15,000 in cash prizes, developers have created intriguing transit-themed apps for smartphones and even regular old computers.

headline.print_headline: In M.T.A. Contest, Many Buttons Worth Pushing
headline.seo: In M.T.A. App Contest, Many Buttons Worth Pushing
headline.main: In M.T.A. App Contest, Many Buttons Worth Pushing
